## MFAContainer.listRecoveryCode() method

Returns a list of MFA recovery code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
listRecoveryCode(): Promise<string[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string[]>`

## Remarks

This feature must be enabled in configuration, otherwise it will fail.
